1.title: What is an DTN token?
1.content: The DTN token is a universal internal currency of the company, which was created for the convenience of working inside the system. 1 OSMI token = $1 US.

2.title: Why do I need to verify my profile?
2.content: Investing in companies is only available to persons who have reached the age of majority.

3.title: How do I verify my profile?
3.content: In your Personal Account, open the 'SETTINGS'. Find the 'VERIFICATION' section and upload all the necessary documents.
